universe_note: Universe: provided packets only (NASDAQ/NYSE-listed common stocks/ADRs). Liquidity gate applied: avg_dollar_volume_20d >= 50,000,000 and price >= 2. Exclusions requiring 5-day % move and dated earnings/catalyst windows could not be fully enforced because packets lack 5-day return and confirmed scheduled event calendars; where catalysts could not be verified as dated within 7 trading days, Catalyst score was capped per rules.

top5.name: Murphy Oil Corporation

target.bear_case_note: Oil discovery narrative fades (no follow-on details/confirmation) or crude/oil equities sell off; a break back below short-term moving averages would weaken momentum.

primary_catalyst.title: Vietnam offshore oil discovery headlines / follow-through newsflow
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Multiple independent headlines describe a 'significant' Vietnam offshore discovery, which can drive near-term repricing via reserve/value expectations and additional appraisal/partner updates.

sources.title: Murphy Oil Makes Southeast Asiaâ€™s Largest Oil Discovery in 20 Years
Murphy Oil Confirms 'Significant' Oil Discovery offshore Vietnam
Murphy Oil confirms major oil reserves with HSV-2X well off Vietnam

risk_factors: Commodity beta: crude price and broader energy risk-on/off can dominate single-name catalysts.
Event follow-through risk: discovery headlines may be partially priced; lack of quantified resource estimates/appraisal timeline can cap upside.

top5.name: Transocean Ltd.

target.bear_case_note: If contract/backlog momentum stalls or oil services sell off; a failure to hold above short-term MAs would weaken the setup.

primary_catalyst.title: New rig contract wins / backlog additions
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Contract awards and backlog additions can shift near-term earnings/cash-flow expectations for offshore drillers and often trigger multi-day momentum follow-through.

sources.title: Transocean's New Deals in Brazil & Norway Add $168M to Firm Backlog
Transocean secures Mykonos contract, Enabler extension worth $168m backlog

risk_factors: High sensitivity to oil price and offshore capex sentiment; macro can overwhelm contract news.
Low-priced stock can be more volatile and headline-driven; gap risk elevated.

top5.name: Phillips 66

target.bear_case_note: If deal terms are viewed negatively (integration/capex/regulatory) or refining margins weaken; failure to hold recent breakout levels.

primary_catalyst.title: Acquisition of Lindsey Oil Refinery (England) / refining narrative
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Deal announcements can re-rate refiners on expected throughput, margin capture, and strategic positioning; can catalyze follow-through if investors view it as accretive.

sources.title: Phillips 66 (PSX) Agrees to Acquire Lindsey Oil Refinery in England
Why Phillips 66 (PSX) Is Up 8.9% After Lindsey Refinery Deal And Refining Gains

risk_factors: M&A execution/regulatory risk; market may demand more detail on valuation and capex.
Refining margin volatility; sector can reverse quickly with crude/product spread changes.

top5.name: Southwest Airlines Co.

target.bear_case_note: If airline earnings read-through turns negative (pricing/costs) or the upgrade is faded; breakdown below short-term trend.

primary_catalyst.title: Analyst action: JPMorgan double-upgrade + new street-high price target
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: A high-profile double-upgrade with a new street-high target can trigger incremental institutional demand and short-term momentum, especially if reinforced by sector earnings read-through.

sources.title: JPM double-upgrades Southwest Airlines shares, sets new street high price target
A Look At Southwest Airlines (LUV) Valuation After JPMorgan Double Upgrade And 2026 Guidance Optimism

risk_factors: Airline group is highly sensitive to macro, fuel prices, and demand signals; sector correlation risk is high.
RSI is very elevated (overbought risk); pullback risk increases if catalysts don't extend.

top5.name: Krystal Biotech, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: If follow-on FDA/clinical updates fail to materialize or are interpreted negatively; biotech risk-off tape can compress multiples quickly.

primary_catalyst.title: Clinical/FDA-related update newsflow (KB407 CF gene therapy data + FDA study filing)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Biotech names can move sharply on incremental clinical/regulatory updates; recent positive data and an FDA study filing can sustain momentum if additional details/next steps emerge.

sources.title: Krystal Biotech (KRYS) Is Up 5.9% After Positive KB407 CF Gene Therapy Data And FDA Study Filing
Krystal Biotech Touts Positive KB407 CF Gene Therapy Data, Eyes Repeat Dosing and Registrational Path

risk_factors: Binary biotech interpretation risk: small details in data/regulatory path can reverse momentum quickly.
RSI is extremely elevated (overbought); higher probability of sharp pullbacks even in uptrends.
